main event: A civilian sighted a bright light changing colors in the sky for approximately 90 seconds on 7 December 1967.
interesting points: The light changed colors from white to red at approximately 1-second intervals., The sighting lasted for 90 seconds., The object was moving in an ESE direction., It disappeared behind St. Louis Heights Hills., The witness is an artist and has been teaching at the University of Hawaii for 5 years.
sighted object: a bright light changing color in the sky
witness description: The witness is Thelma Lilian Vickery, a 50-year-old female artist.
